00041 void CCommentaryReadWindow::applyProfileSettings( CProfileWindow* profileWindow ) {
00042   CLexiconReadWindow::applyProfileSettings(profileWindow);
00043   if (profileWindow->windowSettings())
00044     m_syncButton->setChecked(true);
00045 };
00046 
00047 void CCommentaryReadWindow::storeProfileSettings( CProfileWindow* profileWindow ) {
00048   CLexiconReadWindow::storeProfileSettings(profileWindow);
00049   profileWindow->setWindowSettings( m_syncButton->isChecked() );
00050 };

00060 void CCommentaryReadWindow::initView(){
00061     CLexiconReadWindow::initView();
00062     m_syncButton = new KToggleAction(i18n("Sync with active bible"), ICON_SYNC, KShortcut(0), this, SLOT(syncToggled(bool)), actionCollection());   
00063   m_syncButton->plug(mainToolBar());    
00064 }
00065 
00067 void CCommentaryReadWindow::syncToKey( CSwordKey* const newKey ){
00068   if (m_syncButton->isChecked()) {
00069     CDisplayWindow::lookup(newKey->key());
00070   }
00071 }
